sourcesContent:
import { Outlet, Link, useNavigate, useLocation } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useAuth } from '../store/auth'; function Layout() { const navigate = useNavigate(); const location = useLocation(); const { user, logout, isManager } = useAuth(); const handleLogout = () => { logout(); navigate('/login'); }; const isActiveRoute = (path) => { return location.pathname === path; }; return (
Engineering Resources
{isManager() ? ( <> `px-4 py-2 rounded-lg text-sm font-medium transition-all duration-300 flex items-center space-x-2 ${isActive ? 'bg-blue-600/20 text-white shadow-lg border border-blue-500/20' : 'text-blue-100/80 hover:bg-blue-800/30 hover:text-white' }` } > Projects `px-4 py-2 rounded-lg text-sm font-medium transition-all duration-300 flex items-center space-x-2 ${isActive ? 'bg-blue-600/20 text-white shadow-lg border border-blue-500/20' : 'text-blue-100/80 hover:bg-blue-800/30 hover:text-white' }` } > Team `px-4 py-2 rounded-lg text-sm font-medium transition-all duration-300 flex items-center space-x-2 ${isActive ? 'bg-blue-600/20 text-white shadow-lg border border-blue-500/20' : 'text-blue-100/80 hover:bg-blue-800/30 hover:text-white' }` } > Assignments ) : ( <> `px-4 py-2 rounded-lg text-sm font-medium transition-all duration-300 flex items-center space-x-2 ${isActive ? 'bg-blue-600/20 text-white shadow-lg border border-blue-500/20' : 'text-blue-100/80 hover:bg-blue-800/30 hover:text-white' }` } > My Tasks `px-4 py-2 rounded-lg text-sm font-medium transition-all duration-300 flex items-center space-x-2 ${isActive ? 'bg-blue-600/20 text-white shadow-lg border border-blue-500/20' : 'text-blue-100/80 hover:bg-blue-800/30 hover:text-white' }` } > Profile )}
{user?.name}
); } export default Layout;
